name: Domagna
description:
• Gameplay 
    - Dodge obstacles while falling through a tube with magnetic surfaces.
    - You need to adapt to the magnetism of your character and the walls, and sometimes use your dash energy to fight against repulsion or attraction.
    • Opposite colors attract
    • Same colors repel
    • If either the player or the wall has a gray color, no effect
  • ControlsInputAction Mouse movement / Single touch tap (mobile)Player's directionMouse button Left / Space / Hold touch (mobile)Dash PPause / ResumeRRestart

Better in full screen.

  • Notes
    -     Mobile support is there as an experiment mostly, it is playable, but inputs are not very friendly (also you might see some glitches in the distance). So, it is recommended to play this on a computer.
  • Credits
    - Engine: https://ebiten.org/
    - SFX: https://sfxr.me/
    - Tube textures: https://matlib.gpuopen.com/main/materials/all
    - Source: https://github.com/Zyko0/Magnet
